Screaming Hawk Strike.name: Screaming Hawk Strike
Screaming Hawk Strike.flavor: Your terrifying attack leaves your foe hesitant, diminishing its defenses.
Screaming Hawk Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to AC until the end of your next turn.
Screaming Hawk Strike.special: If you use this power while you are raging, roll a d20. On a 10 or higher, you retain the use of this power.

Fearsome Presence.name: Fearsome Presence
Fearsome Presence.flavor: You enemies quake before you, their attacks becoming weak because of their fear.
Fearsome Presence.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain a +2 bonus to all defenses.

Tide of Battle.name: Tide of Battle
Tide of Battle.flavor: Your allies take heart as you slam your weapon into your foes.
Tide of Battle.effect: An ally within 5 squares of you can spend a healing surge.
